name: "Happy Turkey Day", a Bird Nest Heroes bitsy
name_original: "Happy Turkey Day", a Bird Nest Heroes bitsy
description:
Merry Christmas duckling smith! This my first attempt at bitsy so it's a little rough and probably has a lot of bugs.

In the sprawling metropolis of Aviariopolis, darkness lurks. It's up to our friendly, feathery "Bird Nest Heroes" to save the day from the rampaging giant turkey.
Meet the team:
Redbird-- your bold and rash leader who is as incapable as he is cliche
Bluebird-- the real runner of things, they're who you go to when you need sound advice
Greenbird - prefers the term "turquoise", but she's given up at this point
Magentabird - is really only in it for the money
And you, Yellowbird- the only one who can actually get stuff done.

Make sure to talk to the star-like things for dialogue in "cutscenes". Also use the arrows to advance where needed.
